title: Luděk Sobota
text: Luděk Sobota (born 27 May 1943, <a href="Prague">Prague</a>) is a <a href="Czechs">Czech</a> stand-up <a href="comedian">comedian</a> and <a href="actor">actor</a>. He studied at <a href="Faculty%20of%20Theatre">Faculty of Theatre</a>. He had his own theatre in <a href="Prague">Prague</a>, Divadlo Ludka Soboty (Theatre of Luděk Sobota), which was located near the <a href="Prague%20Metro">metro</a> station <a href="I.%20P.%20Pavlova">I. P. Pavlova</a>. He was in a comedy trio with <a href="Petr%20N%C3%A1ro%C5%BEn%C3%BD">Petr Nárožný</a> and <a href="Miloslav%20%C5%A0imek">Miloslav Šimek</a>. He is also known for providing voice-acting for the protagonist in the "Polda" video game series.
